titleStmt.title: Orders set downe and allowed by the Lordes of her Maiesties priuie counsell, and appoynted to be put in print for the postes betweene London, and the borders of Scotland. At Westminster the fourteenth of Iannary. 1583

titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
